column3: Arcane Magic spells cost 20% less mana, and have 1% per level increased effectiveness.
Holy Magic spells cost 20% less mana, and have 1% per level increased effectiveness.
Nature Magic spells cost 20% less mana, and have 1% per level increased effectiveness.
Destruction Magic spells cost 20% less mana, and have 1% per level increased effectiveness.
Death Magic spells cost 20% less mana, and have 1% per level increased effectiveness.
Increases the damage of all spells which deal Fire damage by 2% per level.
Increases the damage of all spells which deal Lightning damage by 2% per level.
Increases the damage of all spells which deal Earth damage by 2% per level.
Increases the damage of all spells which deal Frost damage by 2% per level.
Increases the damage of all spells which deal Chaos damage by 2% per level.
Increases the increased maximum mana value of your Intelligence skill by +10% + 1% per level.
Increases the effectiveness of your Sorcery skill by +5%.
Increases the effectiveness of your Disruption skill by +10%.
Increases the effectiveness of your Logistics skill by +5%.
Increases the effectiveness of your Pathfinding skill by +10%.
Archers have +1 to Initiative and deal 1% more damage per level.
Crusaders deal 20% +2% per level more damage on their second attack.
Vampire life drain increased by 20% + 2% per level.
Magi can shoot at adjacent units.
Orcs have a 20% + 2% per level chance of shooting an additional ranged attack.
Ballistas and Catapults deal 20% + 2% per level more damage.
Provides your Kingdom with 200 + 50 per level Gold per day.
Footmen perform an additional attack.
Phoenix have a +20% chance to be Reborn.
Unicorns have +10% + 1% per level magic resistance.
Druids have +1 Initiative and +3 Defense.
Elves deal +20% more damage.
Skeletons have +1 Initiative and +1 Speed.
Liches deal +25% damage to units they target directly.
Healing spells restore +20% +1% per level more health.
Your troops have +15% spell resistance.
Your Wolvesâ€™ second attack deals 20% + 2% per level more damage.
Bishops can attack adjacent units.
Bless additionally causes units to deal +1 damage per unit tier.
Increases the effectiveness of your Offense skill by +10%.
Goblins have +2 to damage and +1 to Speed.
Increases the effectiveness of your Defense skill by +5%.
Increases the effectiveness of your Reanimate Dead spell by 1% per level.
Increases your maximum Dark Energy by 15%.
Shadow Bolt deals +20% + 1% per level more damage.
Casting Cripple or Mass Cripple also casts Curse on the target unit.
Increases the effectiveness of your Spell Haste skill by +5%.
Increases the damage of your Lightning Bolt by 1% per level.
Increases the effectiveness of your Ice Lance spell by 50%.
Increases the effectiveness of your Electrocute spell by 40%.
